label: Delete Bot
name: deleteBotAwsLex
description: Deletes all versions of the bot, including the $LATEST version. To delete a specific version of the bot, use the DeleteBotVersion operation. The DeleteBot operation doesn't immediately remove the bot schema. Instead, it is marked for deletion and removed later.

inputs.label: Bot Name
inputs.name: botName
inputs.description: The name of the bot. The name is case sensitive.
